title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs with a REST/CLI API and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI wrapping the Ollama REST API for quick pulls & chats.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama to use local models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing Ollama models as inline Copilot.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama (NuGet: Ollama).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (cross-platform).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings & Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with Bolt framework.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for Ollama (crates.io: ollama-rs).

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama (go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go).

title: ollama-php
summary: PHP client for Ollama (Packagist: ollama/ollama).
